results.title: Screening for YAP Inhibitors Identifies Statins as Modulators of Fibrosis.
results.journal: Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol
results.text_hl: We further show that the @CHEMICAL_Mevalonic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008798 @@@mevalonate@@@ pathway regulates @GENE_YAP1 @GENE_10413 @@@YAP@@@ activation, and that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment reduces @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ markers in activated @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ lung fibroblasts and in the @CHEMICAL_Bleomycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001761 @@@bleomycin@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011658 @@@pulmonary fibrosis@@@.
